comment: Derived from the UNFCCC data on country emissions (IPCC common reporting format); author: UNFCC; year: 1990; for specifics see etdataset-public/source_analyses/RS_serbia/2019/area/Emissions.xlsx

Assumed values of NL dataset scaled with population

No sufficient EU data found, the interconnection costs are therefore calculated using the average interconnection costs from the NL dataset derived from the NvdT study (2017) by CE Delft and multiplied with the interconnection capcity derived from the TYNDP 2025 Scenario's by entso-e and entso-g; year: 2019; author: Quintel
